actions.text: Amendment SA 3228 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 3228 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Graham SC. (consideration: CR S6055-6056) To increase by $3,000,000 the amount authorized to be appropriated by section 201(2) for research, development, test, and evaluation for the Navy and make the increase available for infrastructure system security engineering development, and to provide an offset.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3228 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Graham SC.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3228 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

purpose: To increase by $3,000,000 the amount authorized to be appropriated by section 201(2) for research, development, test, and evaluation for the Navy and make the increase available for infrastructure system security engineering development, and to provide an offset.
